p:
The points in favour of the study:
1.
Previous studies proving the effectiveness of PVP-I against MERS and SARS CoV
2.
The structural similarity of SARS CoV, SARS CoV 2 and MERS
3.
0.5% PVP-I is easy to prepare and is inexpensive
4.
PVP-I has been shown to be a safe therapy when used as a mouthwash or taken nasally
5.
It is easy to dispense to patients and to health care workers
6.
No reported allergies
7.
Though not proved, it probably reduces the viral titres of SARS CoV 2
